entry.def: To prolong something means to make it last longer.

example.ex: Mr Chesler said foreign military aid was prolonging the war...
example.tran: 切斯勒先生说国外的军事援助拉长了战事。

example.ex: The actual action of the drug can be prolonged significantly.
example.tran: 这种药物实际起作用的时间可以大大延长。

sentences.sentence: "there was an indefinite prolongation of the peace talks"

means.word_mean: 2. amount or degree or range to which something extends;

sentences.sentence: "the wire has an extension of 50 feet"

means.word_mean: 3. the consequence of being lengthened in duration
